author: Reuters Editorial
title: Chaparral Energy Year-End 2017 Proved Reserves 76.3 MMBOE
text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Chaparral Energy Inc:
* CHAPARRAL ENERGY SAYS CHAPARRAL’S YEAR-END 2017 PROVED RESERVES, WERE 76.3 MMBOE - SEC FILING
* CHAPARRAL ENERGY INC - 2018 CAPITAL BUDGET IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $250 MILLION‍​ AND $275 MILLION‍​
* CHAPARRAL ENERGY INC - LOE PER BOE FOR 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $7.60 AND $8.20‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2GnnqcJ ) Further company coverage:
